definitions: the appearance of a ghost or secondary image on a television or other display screen

examples.text: the display is sharper and less prone to ghosting

shortDefinitions: appearance of ghost or secondary image on television

definitions: the practice of ending a personal relationship with someone by suddenly and without explanation withdrawing from all communication

examples.text: I thought ghosting was a horrible dating habit reserved for casual flings
a victim of ghosting herself, Dani also admitted that she will ghost guys she’s been dating

shortDefinitions: practice of ending relationship with someone by withdrawing from communication
